BackstoryDef.title: admiral
BackstoryDef.description: Selected from naval officer ranks for strategic brilliance and ideological purity, [PAWN_nameDef] was elevated to admiralty following the suppression of three consecutive insurrections. \nFleet command operations included orbital blockades, system-wide patrols, and the precise use of planetary bombardment as a deterrent tool. [PAWN_pronoun] favored calculated pressure over wasteful force, but issued extermination orders without hesitation when compliance failed. \nImperial review board summary: “Efficient. Ruthless. Unquestionably loyal to the New Order.”
